errors.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.bigLetter: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.smallLetter: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.number: Password must contain at least one number
errors.specialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character

dataProcessingConsent.label: I consent to the processing of my personal data provided in the form for the purpose and to the extent necessary to provide the service, and only for this purpose.
